org.youscope.common.microscope

Interface MicroscopeConfigurationListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface MicroscopeConfigurationListener
extends java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote
    Listener which gets notified if a device of the microscope was removed or its configuration modified.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deviceRemoved(java.lang.String deviceID)
      Called when a previously defined device was removed.
      void labelChanged(DeviceSetting oldLabel, DeviceSetting newLabel)
      Called when a label of a state device changed its name.
      void microscopeUninitialized()
      Called when the microscope is uninitialized.

    • Method Detail

      • microscopeUninitialized

        void microscopeUninitialized()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called when the microscope is uninitialized. All stored values about the microscope configuration should be unloaded.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • deviceRemoved

        void deviceRemoved(java.lang.String deviceID)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called when a previously defined device was removed.
        Parameters:
        deviceID - The ID of the removed device.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • labelChanged

        void labelChanged(DeviceSetting oldLabel,
                  DeviceSetting newLabel)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called when a label of a state device changed its name.
        Parameters:
        oldLabel - Setting containing the old label.
        newLabel - Setting containing the new label.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
